name: 8x8, Inc.
description: 8x8, Inc. is a leading provider of cloud-based communication services, specializing in voice, video, chat, and contact center solutions. Founded in 1987 and headquartered in San Jose, California, 8x8 originally focused on semiconductor technology before pivoting to software and communications. The company has since developed a comprehensive suite of communication tools that enable businesses to enhance their customer engagement and collaboration. 8x8's flagship product, the 8x8 X Series, integrates voice, video, chat, and contact center capabilities into a single platform, allowing organizations to streamline their communications and improve productivity. With a strong emphasis on security and reliability, 8x8’s solutions are designed to meet the needs of businesses of all sizes, from small startups to large enterprises. The company is dedicated to providing innovative and flexible communication solutions tailored to modern work environments, including remote and hybrid work settings. 8x8 also offers global reach with its cloud infrastructure, ensuring high-quality service delivery across multiple geographies. As digital transformation continues to reshape how businesses operate, 8x8 remains at the forefront of communication technology, helping organizations to connect and engage more effectively with their customers and teams.
